LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="7abb2ae6ac1e4950adf9d882f3fe6ea5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I don't think it's possible to express how
grateful I am for your daring rescue...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I am forever indebted to you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7abb2ae6ac1e4950adf9d882f3fe6ea5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]My name is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf09"/]Kayz[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm the assistant to the
president of Tulbo Real Estate.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7abb2ae6ac1e4950adf9d882f3fe6ea5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]My employer and I came to this planet for
a site visit.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="1842010ab9be4542b7183271459db722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hate to bother you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but is my
employer, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf13"/]Chowder[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] alright?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1842010ab9be4542b7183271459db722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Oh. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]So you haven't come across him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1842010ab9be4542b7183271459db722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm sure you're very busy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and this is such
a selfish request,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but could you try to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]find
my employer[System:Color name="Default"]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1842010ab9be4542b7183271459db722" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I'm sure he's OKâ€”he can take care of
himself and is probably just taking his time
exploring, but...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]please keep an eye out.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="ae91896680a84fbbbd7e0eb8378f331f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my employer does have a history of
acting recklessly.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Once he traveled to
another remote planet all by himself...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ae91896680a84fbbbd7e0eb8378f331f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]He started to negotiate with the locals
over the land right away,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] even though he
barely understood their language.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ae91896680a84fbbbd7e0eb8378f331f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Long story short,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there was a slight
miscommunication,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]he was detained.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ae91896680a84fbbbd7e0eb8378f331f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Ever since that happened,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've had to
accompany him on all his scouting trips.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="eaf8a06b94d34bcda31bbf81c4b82f85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My employer has a slightly unpredictable
approach to work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He'll go out for a site
visit day or night,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] any day of the week![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eaf8a06b94d34bcda31bbf81c4b82f85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I always have to be in attendance too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so I've had the chance to see all sorts of
things on all kinds of planets.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eaf8a06b94d34bcda31bbf81c4b82f85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I have nothing but gratitude for him and
all the experiences this work has provided.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="15a77533553f4f96bb0642cf2f457a11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]This isn't the first time we've been
stranded...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but usually the stakes aren't
quite this high.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15a77533553f4f96bb0642cf2f457a11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I think he'll be just fine.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm probably
worrying over nothing...
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="c09ae37d736c491a8f9f2d11ff67a0d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thank you, thank you, thank you! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm so
grateful to you for rescuing my employer.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c09ae37d736c491a8f9f2d11ff67a0d5" Scale="1"/]This couldn't possibly be enough.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've
done so very much for us...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But please
take this.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="53c76da46e6d4c88941b57f41e50ea70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I would like to sincerely thank you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] once
again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for all your help and for coming to
our aid, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="53c76da46e6d4c88941b57f41e50ea70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]My employer doesn't always consider the
risk to himself.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] His first priority is making
enough money to pay his employees.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="53c76da46e6d4c88941b57f41e50ea70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]He's always putting us first.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I honestly
don't know what the company would do
without him.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="86abcc4e8d9e491a85943f8dd7558a98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thank you, thank you, thank you! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm so
grateful to you for rescuing my employer.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="86abcc4e8d9e491a85943f8dd7558a98" Scale="1"/]This couldn't possibly be enough.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've
done so very much for us...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But please
take this.

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="c280f94042524758945b93afff921e76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I would like to sincerely thank you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] once
again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for all your help and for coming to
our aid, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c280f94042524758945b93afff921e76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]My employer doesn't always consider the
risk to himself.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] His first priority is making
enough money to pay his employees.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c280f94042524758945b93afff921e76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]He's always putting us first.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I honestly
don't know what the company would do
without him.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="ec1a4200791241ac9793d592ecdf2612" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm so relieved that my employer has been
found safe.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ec1a4200791241ac9793d592ecdf2612" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]He's, uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not the type to avoid danger at
all costs.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ec1a4200791241ac9793d592ecdf2612" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Even if he were attacked by a fearsome
creature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he would never stand down.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I've always admired that about him.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="7a7917f579d64e89aede8efb0cbb49d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We have property listings near the Planet
Karut station.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] From there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's an easy
commute to many vacation destinations.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7a7917f579d64e89aede8efb0cbb49d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Like Mihama,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for example.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We can
find listings that satisfy all your needs...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
We guarantee it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7a7917f579d64e89aede8efb0cbb49d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you're ever in the market for a new
home or property,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] please come visit us
over at Tulbo Real Estate!
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="5bfd46309469422a8837cdb598071b60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My employer is a natural salesperson,
through and through.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bfd46309469422a8837cdb598071b60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]He talks about the scorching desert on
Siguray,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] calling it a place that's blessed
with abundant natural light.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bfd46309469422a8837cdb598071b60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]He's described the steep rocky mountains
on Flukuey as the best place for a home
with stunning views in every room.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bfd46309469422a8837cdb598071b60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The lush jungle on Ooji is a relaxing
environment, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]where you're surrounded
by the beauty of nature...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bfd46309469422a8837cdb598071b60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's how he convinces potential clients
to come out and look at those properties.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bfd46309469422a8837cdb598071b60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]It doesn't always result in a sale, but it's
worth a try, I suppose.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's not what you
say but how you say it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="f9eb59164f3f44fcaa7c4d67e066f902" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Fortunately,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it appears the land rights on
this planet are essentially untouched.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f9eb59164f3f44fcaa7c4d67e066f902" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Now is the time I usually get started on
the paperwork so we can claim all the
exclusive rights.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f9eb59164f3f44fcaa7c4d67e066f902" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Once I get back home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll prepare the
documents and start negotiating with
the Interstellar Land-Use Office.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="fe6bea82624d4f5c92f2e45e55a28284" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]People like to say that my employer has
just gotten lucky over the years.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think
that "luck" stems from his personality.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fe6bea82624d4f5c92f2e45e55a28284" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Not just anyone could see a business
opportunity with serious obstacles and
make a profit from it with luck alone.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="b3a04fd14db94747a0c1d09037cb25e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my employer does have a history of
acting recklessly.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Once he traveled to
another remote planet all by himself...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3a04fd14db94747a0c1d09037cb25e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]He started to negotiate with the locals
over the land right away,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] even though he
barely understood their language.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3a04fd14db94747a0c1d09037cb25e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Long story short,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there was a slight
miscommunication,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]he was detained.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3a04fd14db94747a0c1d09037cb25e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Ever since that happened,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've had to
accompany him on all his scouting trips.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="b600175e2a7b4e46842bdeaf5d5d3f1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My employer has a slightly unpredictable
approach to work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He'll go out for a site
visit day or night,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] any day of the week![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b600175e2a7b4e46842bdeaf5d5d3f1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I always have to be in attendance too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so I've had the chance to see all sorts of
things on all kinds of planets.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b600175e2a7b4e46842bdeaf5d5d3f1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I have nothing but gratitude for him and
all the experiences this work has provided.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="47ee68c904994203982eb6881d6a6bec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm so relieved that my employer has been
found safe.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47ee68c904994203982eb6881d6a6bec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]He's, uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not the type to avoid danger at
all costs.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47ee68c904994203982eb6881d6a6bec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Even if he were attacked by a fearsome
creature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he would never stand down.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I've always admired that about him.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="8ebf491d4315482b8a609a61d5e04f58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We have property listings near the Planet
Karut station.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] From there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's an easy
commute to many vacation destinations.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ebf491d4315482b8a609a61d5e04f58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Like Mihama,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for example.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We can
find listings that satisfy all your needs...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
We guarantee it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ebf491d4315482b8a609a61d5e04f58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you're ever in the market for a new
home or property,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] please come visit us
over at Tulbo Real Estate!
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="4e088c22c0004d18acf4b2598dcef091" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hello there, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm glad to see you're
in good spirits today,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="e7a561f33df840658acf755784a43684" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We have a lot of listings for dogs too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e7a561f33df840658acf755784a43684" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Please let us help you if you ever decide
to purchase a home for yourself!
LF008.LF008_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="b899e404e345495c9e7200c6a82abf59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Is this what I think it is?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b899e404e345495c9e7200c6a82abf59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I've always wished I could have another me
around to help me finish all my extra work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Did my wish finally come true?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b899e404e345495c9e7200c6a82abf59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]...Oh. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]How embarrassing. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I got excited for
a moment there, but then it turns out...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Sorry, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
